Each character described with a description, different displays (isolated, at the beginning, middle and the end of a word), a codification (Unicode, others could be added later), and two transliterations (Buckwalter and wiki);2014;lexicalConceptualResource;http://hdl.handle.net/11372/LRT-1945;ara;Creative Commons - Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0);http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/;PUB;text/xml;text/plain; charset=utf-8;downloadable_files_count: 1;Ibtikarat team;http://arabic.emi.ac.ma/ibtikarat/?q=Resources
name: fffb353b-19f7-5a5d-a227-9db30461e49a
notes: A XML-based file containing all Arabic characters (letters, vowels and punctuations). Each character described with a description, different displays (isolated, at the beginning, middle and the end of a word), a codification (Unicode, others could be added later), and two transliterations (Buckwalter and wiki)
title: Arabic characters lexicon
